content:
I obliquely referred to this in last week's meeting, but I've stepped down from Core to get a bit of a break and eventually be able to focus on the devtools more. I'll probably be able to have more time to help our smaller teams grow soon!

https://blog.rust-lang.org/2021/09/27/Core-team-membership-updates.html
cc @Caleb Cartwright @Daniel Silverstone @Eric Huss @Joshua Nelson @GuillaumeGomez @Pascal

I'll probably be able to have more time to help our smaller teams grow soon!

I may be interested to help this effort by joining the team myself. But first I got to figure out how I can better document the release/sync/plumbing/... work in Clippy, so I'm no longer the only person that knows how to do that.
@flip1995 that would be _amazing_ (both things) :D
